---
category: news
title: "Artificial intelligence in sepsis early prediction and diagnosis using unstructured data in healthcare"
excerpt: "Early prediction and diagnosis of sepsis, which is critical in reducing mortality, is challenging as many of its signs and symptoms are similar to other less critical conditions. Here, the authors develop an artificial intelligence algorithm which uses both structured data and unstructured clinical notes to predict sepsis."
